Ion content in the sample (w%)

Source: R/fun_salt_wt.R
fun_salt_wt.Rd

Calculate weight fraction of each individual ion from concentration (ppm or mg/L), volume of water (mL) and the dry mass of the sample (g).

Usage

fun_salt_wt(salt_ppm, dry_g, water_ml)

Arguments

salt_ppm

Ion concentration in ppm or mg/L

dry_g

Sample weight, g

water_ml

Amount of water, mL

Value

salt_wt Ion content in the sample (w%)

Details

Eqn 1. Weight fraction (w_i), preparation for charge balance equations.

Examples

# Chloride test data
fun_salt_wt(66.824, 1.128, 100)
#> [1] 0.5924113
